setting.environment: Exterior doorway with textured stone or natural concrete wall and a dark painted wooden door
setting.atmosphere: Warm, sensual, high-end editorial lifestyle aesthetic with subtle tribal influence

viewing_angle.camera_height: Approximately chest height of the subject
viewing_angle.angle: Straight-on with a subtle downward tilt
viewing_angle.perspective_effect: Natural human-eye perspective with flattering compression, no distortion

lighting.shadow_characteristics: High-contrast shadows carving out muscle definition, abs, and facial structure

composition.rule_of_thirds: Face and upper torso aligned near center
composition.visual_balance: Balanced between illuminated subject and darker background
composition.depth: Moderate depth created primarily through lighting contrast
composition.leading_elements: Door frame and wall subtly guide attention toward the subject

image_quality.sharpness: Extreme sharpness on face, bust, and abdominal definition
image_quality.dynamic_range: Wide dynamic range preserving highlights and deep shadows
image_quality.overall_style: Luxury Instagram fitness and tribal-inspired editorial photography

overall_mood.aesthetic: Indigenous-inspired fantasy meets elite fitness editorial
overall_mood.visual_focus: Powerful emphasis on facial beauty, extreme body definition, and curves

facial_features.face_shape: Soft oval-to-heart hybrid face with gentle tapering toward the chin, avoiding sharp angles
facial_features.jawline: Smooth, elegant jawline with subtle definition—feminine and refined rather than angular or severe
facial_features.cheekbones: High, softly rounded cheekbones that catch light naturally without appearing sharp or hollow

eyes.shape: Large, expressive almond-shaped eyes with a slight upward outer tilt
eyes.eye_lids: Subtle epicanthic fold with softly hooded upper lids
eyes.irises: Deep warm brown with golden undertones
eyes.lashes: Long, thick lashes creating a naturally sultry frame

facial_features.eyebrows: Softly arched brows with a natural thickness, enhancing expression without harsh angles

nose.structure: Small-to-medium size with a smooth bridge
nose.tip: Softly rounded, slightly upturned tip—delicate and feminine
nose.overall_character: Refined but natural, not overly sharp or narrow

lips.shape: Full, pillowy lips with a well-defined cupid's bow
lips.balance: Slightly fuller bottom lip for softness and sensuality
lips.texture: Naturally plush with a hydrated sheen

skin_details.complexion: Flawless golden complexion with subtle natural variations
skin_details.features: Very faint beauty marks or skin texture for realism

subject.facial_expression: Calm, magnetic expression—soft confidence with a hint of mystery and warmth
subject.gaze_direction: Direct but gentle eye contact, inviting rather than confrontational
subject.makeup: Luxury editorial glam emphasizing glowing skin, softly contoured cheeks, luminous eyes, and glossy nude lips
subject.build: Extremely lean, ripped physique with very low body fat, sharply defined abs, obliques, and visible upper-body muscle separation
subject.body_proportions: Striking contrast between a razor-thin waist, deeply defined core, and very large, full breasts

hair.style: Thick, glossy hair worn loose with subtle natural texture, lightly windswept

top.style: Minimal leather-and-suede-inspired bikini top with triangular panels
top.color: Earth tones (warm tan, muted turquoise accents)
top.design_details: Fringe elements, subtle beadwork, and natural-texture stitching
top.fit: Very minimal coverage designed to accentuate a full, prominent bust
top.interaction: Lightly held at the straps by both hands, emphasizing chest and posture

bottom.color: Matching earth tones with turquoise bead accents
bottom.design_details: Fringe and asymmetrical cut inspired by indigenous fantasy fashion
bottom.fit: Minimal coverage sitting low on the hips, highlighting obliques and V-cut abs

clothing.accessories: Optional subtle tribal-inspired armband or feather accent, no modern jewelry

pose.stance: Strong, confident stance with relaxed dominance
pose.leg_position: Weight shifted to one hip to emphasize curves and muscular legs
pose.arm_position: Both arms raised with elbows bent, hands holding bikini straps
pose.torso_orientation: Facing the camera with a slight torso twist to maximize waist-to-bust contrast
pose.head_position: Slight tilt adding softness to an otherwise powerful pose
pose.pose_intent: Fierce, seductive, and empowered high-fashion fitness pose

background_elements: Light-colored textured stone or concrete wall
surrounding.color_contrast: Strong contrast between earth-toned bikini, golden skin, and dark background
